name: @luxbai-dev/chainui
description: A lightweight JavaScript library for building user interfaces with a simple, elegant, and chainable API
author: luxiubai

scripts.build: esbuild src/chainui.js --bundle --minify --format=iife --global-name=ChainUI --outfile=build/iife/chainui.min.js && esbuild src/chainui.js --bundle --minify --format=esm --outfile=build/esm/chainui.min.js && esbuild src/chainui.js --bundle --minify --format=cjs --outfile=build/cjs/chainui.min.js && npm run generate-types
